Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.jeopardy.service.Game
public class Game extends Object
High-level game controller that manages:
  • Game state (players, questions, status)
  • Event logging via GameEventLogger
  • Summary report generation
This class provides a simple wrapper around GameState and ties together core actions such as starting the game, answering questions, determining winners, and ending the session.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Creates a new game instance with: Fresh GameState A unique case ID based on system time CSV event logger Text-based summary report generator

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Creates a new game instance with:
      • Fresh GameState
      • A unique case ID based on system time
      • CSV event logger
      • Text-based summary report generator

  • Method Details

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()
      Returns:
      the active GameState instance for this session.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Begins the game by setting state to IN_PROGRESS and logging a "Start Game" event.

    • loadQuestions

      public void loadQuestions(List<Question> questions)
      Loads all questions into the GameState and logs the action.
      Parameters:
      questions - list of question objects to attach to the game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the game and logs a "Join Game" event.
      Parameters:
      player - the player joining the session

    • answerQuestion

      public boolean answerQuestion(Player player, Question question, String answer)
      Processes a player's answer to a question.

      Updates:

      • Player score (only if correct)
      • Marked state of the question
      Also logs an "Answer Question" event including: category, value, selected answer, result, and updated score.
      Parameters:
      player - the player answering
      question - the question being answered
      answer - the player's chosen option (A/B/C/D)
      Returns:
      true if the answer was correct

    • getWinners

      public List<Player> getWinners()
      Computes and returns the list of players with the highest score. Supports tie scenarios.
      Returns:
      list of winner(s)

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game by:
      • Setting status to FINISHED
      • Logging a "Game End" event with the final outcome
      • Generating a summary report

    • isTie

      public boolean isTie()
      Returns:
      true if the top score is shared by two or more players.

    • getGameResult

      public String getGameResult()
      Returns:
      a formatted message summarizing the winning state or tie.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      the player whose turn it currently is.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Advances the turn to the next player in the rotation.
